quote: Find your own rhythm, and ride it.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: Let your heart guide you, it whispers, so listen closely.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: The purpose of life is to enjoy every moment.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: Happiness is not a destination, it's a way of life.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: Embrace the present moment, it is all we truly have.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: Trust the journey, even when you don't understand it.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: Your inner strength is your outer foundation.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: Inhale confidence, exhale doubt.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: Fill your cup with love, and it will overflow.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: Believe in yourself, and magic will happen.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: Let go of what no longer serves you, and make space for new blessings.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: You are capable of amazing things, never doubt your potential.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: Be a warrior, not a worrier.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: Choose joy, even in the midst of chaos.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: Practice gratitude, it will change your perspective.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: Find peace within, and you will radiate it to the world.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting their own battles.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: Embrace change, it is the only constant in life.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: Follow your dreams, they know the way.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: You are not alone, the universe is always guiding you.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: May all beings be happy.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: We can always start again.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: The one who listens understands.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: What can you appreciate in this moment?
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: The unknown is where all outcomes are possible: enter it with grace.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: Your breath fills you with energy, anywhere and anytime you need it.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: The world needs your unique gifts, don't leave with them still inside you.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: Never regret your mistakes. Admire the courage it took to attempt the unknown.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: The purpose of life is to know yourself, love yourself, trust yourself, and be yourself.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: People who love are happy.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: Love is the ultimate law of life.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: Your greatest strength is love.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: The principal ingredient of life is love.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: Live righteously and love everyone, you will build up around you an aura of light and love.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: Your potential self is infinite.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: Every neighbor can be your teacher.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: Without the storms and rain, life would cease to be.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: Know the unknown, hear the unheard, see the unseen.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: When you become part of the universe, the universe becomes part of you.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: Breathe is the voice of your soul.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: Without gratitude, there is no prosperity.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: Without darkness, you would never know the light.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: One who knows how to enjoy life does not need riches.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: It is the light in the lantern which shows you the path, not the lantern.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: The only thing that can limit you is believing that you are limited. Become limitless.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: Use your head to live with heart.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: Your actions prove your greatness.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: Let the opportunities come to you.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: What belongs to you shall come to you.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: Smiling is the most basic kind of peace work.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: Compassion is the fountain of forgiveness.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: Lift up others with your peaceful presence.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: The worst enemy we have is our own fear.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: Trust your identity, be in touch with your reality.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: Balance of head and heart yields strength of character.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: Be kind to others, but always be compassionate to yourself.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: Find strength in knowing that you can make a difference in the world.
author: Yogi™ Tea Bags

quote: Travel light, live light, spread the light, be the light.
author: Yogi Bhajan

quote: Don't search for heaven and hell in the future. Both are now, within your reach.
author: Yogi Bhajan

quote: The purpose of life is to find God through the grace of God.
author: Yogi Bhajan

quote: When you are in tune with the unknown, the known is peaceful.
author: Yogi Bhajan

quote: The only way to live is to do what you love, not what you think you should be doing.
author: Yogi Bhajan

quote: Your mind is your servant, your body is your vehicle, and your soul is your residence.
author: Yogi Bhajan

quote: You must understand the purpose of life is the expansion of happiness.
author: Yogi Bhajan

quote: Don't beg for anything; you are the infinite power.
author: Yogi Bhajan

quote: The greatest strength is in overcoming our weaknesses.
author: Yogi Bhajan

quote: The purpose of life is not to be happy. It is to be useful, to be honorable, to be compassionate, to have it make some difference that you have lived and lived well.
author: Yogi Bhajan

quote: If you want to learn something, read about it. If you want to understand something, write about it. If you want to master something, teach it.
author: Yogi Bhajan

quote: Life is a book. Those who do not travel read only one page.
author: Yogi Bhajan

quote: When you don't go within, you go without.
author: Yogi Bhajan

quote: A teacher is a person who gives you something to take home to think about besides homework.
author: Yogi Bhajan

quote: The attitude of gratitude is the highest yoga.
author: Yogi Bhajan

quote: You owe it to yourself to be yourself, in every possible way.
author: Yogi Bhajan

quote: Your essence is your presence.
author: Yogi Bhajan

quote: Your strength is how calmly, quietly, and peacefully you face life.
author: Yogi Bhajan

quote: If you can't see God in all, you can't see God at all.
author: Yogi Bhajan

quote: The greatest reward of doing Sadhana is that the person becomes incapable of being defeated.
author: Yogi Bhajan

quote: The future ain't what it used to be.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: You can observe a lot by just watching.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: If you don't know where you are going, you might wind up someplace else.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: It's tough to make predictions, especially about the future.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: You've got to be very careful if you don't know where you are going, because you might not get there.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: It ain't over 'til it's over.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: In theory, there's no difference between theory and practice. In practice, there is.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: You can't think and hit at the same time.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: When you come to a fork in the road, take it.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: The only way to achieve anything is to work for it.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: If you don't set goals, you can't regret not reaching them.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: The future is much too important to be left to the future.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: It's not the heat, it's the humility.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: A nickel ain't worth a dime anymore.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: You can't hit and think at the same time.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: It's never crowded along the extra mile.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: It's like déjà vu all over again.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: You've got to be very careful if you don't know where you're going, because you might not get there.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: Nobody goes there anymore because it's too crowded.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: If you can't imitate him, don't copy him.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: The ultimate goal of yoga is to always observe things accurately, and therefore never act in a way that will make us regret our actions later.
author: T.K.V. Desikachar

quote: Yoga is the journey of the self, through the self, to the self.
author: The Bhagavad Gita

quote: The key to happiness is not found in seeking more, but in developing the capacity to enjoy less.
author: Sakyong Mipham

quote: Happiness is not a destination, it is a way of life.
Yoga is the dance of every cell with the music of every breath that creates inner serenity and harmony.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The secret of happiness is to count your blessings while others are adding up their troubles.
author: William Penn

quote: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Yoga teaches us to cure what need not be endured and endure what cannot be cured.
author: B.K.S. Iyengar

quote: The mind is everything. What you think, you become.
author: Buddha

quote: Yoga is the journey of the self, through the self, to the self.
author: The Bhagavad Gita

quote: Inhale the future, exhale the past.
Yoga is not about touching your toes, it's about what you learn on the way down.
The rhythm of the body, the melody of the mind, and the harmony of the soul create the symphony of life.
author: B.K.S. Iyengar

quote: Yoga teaches us to cure what need not be endured and endure what cannot be cured.
author: B.K.S. Iyengar

quote: Yoga is the perfect opportunity to be curious about who you are.
author: Jason Crandell

quote: Be a lamp to yourself. Be your own confidence. Hold on to the truth within yourself as to the only truth.
author: Buddha

quote: Yoga is the fountain of youth. You're only as young as your spine is flexible.
author: Bob Harper

quote: The pose begins when you want to leave it.
author: Baron Baptiste

quote: Yoga is the art of listening to your body.
author: Rodney Yee
